授業目的: To obtain fluency and confidence in expressing yourself in English, and train guidance of others in English usages.
到達目標: The participant can produce well-argued texts. They can give an oral presentation. They can organize a 45-minute class and teach their peers a topic in English.
授業方法: Class instructions, group work, individual presentation and feedback.  Writing and presentation assignments,  diary-keeping, and individual, longer oral presentations.

第1回:
Introduction to the course and ourselves. 
 Assignment of the diary project: Keep a diary in English in hand. Write on average 5 entries @ 80 words per week for 10 weeks. Illustrations are accepted, and can count 20 percent of an entry, if the relevance is made clear. The total of quotation in any entry should not exceed 20 percent of the entry; i.e., up to 16 words in a 80-word entry. All quotations, direct or indirect, must be marked or otherwise identified.
Work with lesson One in the textbook, "Happiness."

With the textbook, you will have access to SPRAK platform full of exercises. Some of them will be assigned during the course, and should be completed within two weeks of assignment. Registration is necessary, but we will get it ready as soon as possible. 

HW: Start the diary. 
Bring your diary for the next class. It should have five to seven entries.
